title: Probability and Mathematical Statistics
overview: This course provides knowledge and skills in data analysis and decision support using probability and statistical methods. It consists of two main parts: (1) foundational knowledge in probability and probability distributions, (2) statistical methods with applications in economics and business, including portfolio management and quality management.

skill_outcomes.outcome_description: Students will be able to use Excel and R for data visualization and statistical analysis.
Students will be able to make inferences from data and support decision-making in economics and business.
